title: Show more stats, under the league tab in profile greyed out
body: It's greyed out and i've played 130+ games so far, with more than just 5 champs, why is it greyed out, and when will it be fixed?

replies.body:
It's greyed out for everyone, and has been since the beginning of season. Best to use op.gg for now. 

it will be fixed  soon(tm)
